siteMetadata.title: Scuffletown Garden
siteMetadata.description: Scuffletown Garden brings sustainable and friendly New American Cuisine to the iconic fan neighborhood without breaking the bank. With ample parking and open seven days a week, serving weekday lunch, weekend brunch, and dinner daily. Our happy hour is 4:30-6:30, Monday-Friday.
siteMetadata.author: Cezar Carvalhaes
